    • Method Detail

      • placeObject

        public abstract <T extends org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> java.util.Iterator<scala.Tuple2<java.lang.Integer,T>> placeObject(T spatialObject)
                                                                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Given a geometry, returns a list of partitions it overlaps.

        For points, returns exactly one partition as long as grid type is non-overlapping. For other geometry types or for overlapping grid types, may return multiple partitions.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

public abstract DedupParams getDedupParams()
